thread.title: No issues at all , great location for us , quiet !
thread.title_full: No issues at all , great location for us , quiet ! - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tom144
title: No issues at all , great location for us , quiet !
text:
Staff helpful on arrival and put us on a high floor as requested. Handy concierge in the lobby with non pushy approach to explaining the options for companies they are affiliated too . Room was clean , bed comfy , good shower and no noise from outside . Oh and location wise - perfect for everything , we were either max 20
mins walk or a few tube stops from pretty much all the major attractions . Also being in the financial district it was quiet when you set foot outside and not instantly manic like further into town . Tube pass $32 for the week , a bargain . Thanks Holiday Inn for providing a great base to explore from .
